name: MPMediaEntity
desc: The abstract superclass for media items, media item collections, and media playlist instances.

items.name: class func canFilter(byProperty: String) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates if a media property key can be used to construct a media property predicate.

items.name: func enumerateValues(forProperties: Set<String>, using: (String, Any, UnsafeMutablePointer<ObjCBool>) -> Void)
items.desc: Executes a provided block with the fetched values for the given item properties.

items.name: var persistentID: MPMediaEntityPersistentID
items.desc: The persistent identifier for a media entity.

items.name: subscript(Any) -> Any?
items.desc: Returns the object specified by the key.

items.name: func value(forProperty: String) -> Any?
items.desc: Retrieves the value for a specified media property key.

items.name: typealias MPMediaEntityPersistentID
items.desc: Defines the type for storing a persistent identifier to a particular entity.
